name: Emma
testimonial: I had the best summer ever at this camp! I learned to create beautiful crafts, and the counselors were so patient and helpful. Along with that did tracking and camping and made lots of new friends.Can't wait to come back next year!

name: Liam
testimonial: This camp made my summer unforgettable. I made new friends and discovered my love for painting. I proudly displayed my artwork at home, and my family loved it!
